verses.verse: So That, <S%G5620><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren <S%G3450><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Longed For, <S%G1973><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Crown <S%G4735><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Stand Fast <S%G4739><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Beloved. <S%G27><s%>

Euodia <S%G2136><s%> I Exhort, <S%G3870><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Syntyche <S%G4941><s%> I Exhort, <S%G3870><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Be Of The Same Mind <S%G5426><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Ask <S%G2065><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> Yoke Fellow <S%G4805><s%> True, <S%G1103><s%> Assist <S%G4815><s%> These Women, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Strove Together <S%G4866><s%> With Me; <S%G3427><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Clement, <S%G2815><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> <S%G4904><s%> Of My Fellow Workers, <S%G3450><s%> Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Names <S%G3686><s%> Are In The <S%G1722><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> Of Life. <S%G2222><s%>
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Always : <S%G3842><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I Will Say, <S%G2046><s%> Rejoice. <S%G5463><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1933><s%> Your Gentleness <S%G5216><s%> Let Be Known <S%G1097><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> Near. <S%G1451><s%>

Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Be Careful About, <S%G3309><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Prayer <S%G4335><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> By Supplication <S%G1162><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G155><s%> Your Requests <S%G5216><s%> Let Be Made Known <S%G1107><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Surpasses <S%G5242><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Understanding <S%G3563><s%> Shall Guard <S%G5432><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thoughts <S%G3540><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The Rest, <S%G3063><s%> Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Whatsoever Things <S%G3745><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> True, <S%G227><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Venerable, <S%G4586><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Just, <S%G1342><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Pure, <S%G53><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Lovely, <S%G4375><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> Of Good Report; <S%G2163><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Virtue <S%G703><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Praise, <S%G1868><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Consider. <S%G3049><s%>

What <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Learned <S%G3129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Received <S%G3880><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Me, <S%G1698><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Do; <S%G4238><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace <S%G1515><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G5463><s%> But I Rejoiced <S%G1161><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Greatly, <S%G3171><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G2235><s%> Now At Length <S%G4218><s%> Ye Revived Your <S%G330><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G5228><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Thinking; <S%G5426><s%> ' <S%G1909><s%> Although <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Were Thinking, <S%G5426><s%> <S%G170><s%> But Ye Were Lacking Opportunity. <S%G1161><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> ' As To <S%G2596><s%> Destitution <S%G5304><s%> I Speak; <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1473><s%> For I 1063 CONJ Learned 3129 V-2AAI-1S In 1722 PREP What Circumstances 3739 R-DPM I Am, 1510 V-PXI-1S Content 842 A-NSM To Be. 1511 V-PXN

<S%G1492><s%> And I Know How <S%G1161><s%> To Be Brought Low, <S%G5013><s%> <S%G1492><s%> And I Know How <S%G2532><s%> To Abound. <S%G4052><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Everything <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> I Am Initiated <S%G3453><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> To Be Full <S%G5526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Hunger, <S%G3983><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> To Abound <S%G4052><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Deficient. <S%G5302><s%>
All Things <S%G3956><s%> I Am Strong For <S%G2480><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Who Empowers <S%G1743><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But <S%G4133><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Ye Did, <S%G4160><s%> Having Fellowship In <S%G4790><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Tribulation. <S%G2347><s%>

Know <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> O Philippians, <S%G5374><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings, <S%G2098><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> I Came Out <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> Not Any <S%G3762><s%> With Me <S%G3427><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Had Fellowship <S%G2841><s%> With Regard To <S%G1519><s%> An Account <S%G3056><s%> Of Giving <S%G1394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Receiving, <S%G3028><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Alone; <S%G3441><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Twice <S%G1364><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5532><s%> My Need <S%G3427><s%> Ye Sent. <S%G3992><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Seek After <S%G1934><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Gift, <S%G1390><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> I Seek After <S%G1934><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Abounds <S%G4121><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Your Account. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G568><s%> But I Have <S%G1161><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Abound; <S%G4052><s%> I Am Full, <S%G4137><s%> Having Received <S%G1209><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> An Odour <S%G3744><s%> Of A Sweet Smell, <S%G2175><s%> A Sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> Acceptable, <S%G1184><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316><s%> My God <S%G3450><s%> Will Fill Up <S%G4137><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5532><s%> Your Need <S%G5216><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4149><s%> His Riches <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But To The <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Of Us Be <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Saint <S%G40><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> <S%G3122><s%> And Especially <S%G1161><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Household. <S%G3614><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ Be <S%G5547><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To The <S%G4314><s%> Philippians <S%G5374><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Rome, <S%G4516><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Epaphroditus. <S%G1891><s%>
